nodes.text: Cait was a female individual in the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry during the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire. She served as a Forward Air Controller for the company, directing their X-wing starfighters to their targets.

At some point between 2 BBY and 0 BBY, the 61st was deployed onto the planet Allst Prime to attack the Imperial outpost there. Cait was killed during the battle, and Micha Evon, the captain of the 61st, took her receiver and began yelling orders to the X-wings. At the same time, the bounty hunter Brand saw Cait's body from afar and examined the signs of trauma on her.
Cait appeared as a corpse in the short story "Inbrief," written by Janine K. Spendlove and first published in Star Wars Insider 161 on November 10, 2015.
